channel.title: Client in Visual Basic 2008
channel.description:
I'm sure there are many flaws with this, but me and a group of people are going to attempt to convert all of the code/cache of a runescape client, into pure visual basic code, along with the Java only parts on the side. Ask me how we're going to do this? No idea yet.
We're convinced it's possible, so we're going to attempt.
Again, there must be many flaws with this, go ahead list them.. it's great help.

item.title: Client in Visual Basic 2008
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Why in the world would you do it in something like VB? You aren’t trying to increase the speed are you? Because VB is compiled to bytecode just like Java is, it isn’t native anymore. You would be losing all cross-platform compatibility, and it wouldn’t run in a browser anymore. There seems to be many cons and very few pros.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

you know how you may specify a url for the shockwave object to load from? this time import a java object and make it load your cache. its abit like making a webclient, but i didnt attempt this. GL
